explains: v. 发现，找到；了解到，发觉，查明；发掘（人才）；初次接触

sentences.en: Only later did she discover a talent for writing.
sentences.cn: 她后来才发现自己的写作天分。

sentences.en: We happened to discover we had a friend in common.
sentences.cn: 我们碰巧发现我们有个共同的朋友。

sentences.en: Wind forward to the bit where they discover the body.
sentences.cn: 往前绕片，绕到他们发现尸体的那一截。
